mapper.select: SELECT SUM(O.TOTAL_SALE_PRICE) AS SUM_SALE_PRICE , COUNT(*) AS SUM_ORDER_CNT FROM TORDER O WHERE O.ORDER_DATE >= (SELECT OC.MODIFY_DATE FROM TOPENCLOSE OC WHERE OC.CLOSE_MONEY IS NULL)

SELECT SUM(O.TOTAL_SALE_PRICE) AS SUM_CANCEL_PRICE , COUNT(*) AS SUM_CANCEL_CNT FROM TORDER O WHERE O.ORDER_DATE >= (SELECT OC.MODIFY_DATE FROM TOPENCLOSE OC WHERE OC.CLOSE_MONEY IS NULL) AND O.ORDER_STATUS_NO = 'OS002'
SELECT SUM(O.DISCOUNT_PRICE) AS DISCOUNT_PRICE FROM TORDER O WHERE O.ORDER_DATE >= (SELECT OC.MODIFY_DATE FROM TOPENCLOSE OC WHERE OC.CLOSE_MONEY IS NULL) AND O.ORDER_STATUS_NO = 'OS003'

SELECT COUNT(*) AS REAL_ORDER_CNT , SUM(O.TOTAL_SALE_PRICE) AS TOTAL_SALE_PRICE FROM TORDER O WHERE O.ORDER_DATE >= (SELECT OC.MODIFY_DATE FROM TOPENCLOSE OC WHERE OC.CLOSE_MONEY IS NULL) AND O.ORDER_STATUS_NO = 'OS003'
